p: Mediastinal lymph nodes (MLN) were excised and a single cell suspension obtained by physical disruption and filtration through a 70μm cell strainer. Cells were washed in flow buffer and treated with RBC lysis buffer for 2 min at room temperature. Cells were topped up with flow buffer, centrifuged (600xg, 5 min at 4°C) and resuspended in 1ml of flow buffer.
